channel.description: Recent content in 2017s on Stanley Zheng

item.title: NPM Food - Emojis + NPM Packaging
item.description: npm install -g food If we installed this package from NPM, what do we expect this to do? What kind of interface would we expect this to implement? I’m not quite sure; This was one of those ideas that I had a spark of an idea and started four years ago. Watching the package go stale and be empty for years reminded me I should try and provide another valuable node package to the world.
